channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Kerb is raised and uneven because of tree close to road, 23rd September
item.description:
End of Priors Road (B4075) where it meets the roundabout with Harp Hill. I think itâ€™s the kerb by the third tree on the left as you head North. It is quite narrow there and I was forced to the left slightly because of a lorry. My wheel hit the kerb at the exact spot where it is raised and uneven because of the tree. My tyre immediately burst because a hole was ripped in it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Priors Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned work, 23rd September
item.description:
Top of Millham Road Bishops cleeve road work materials. Left like this for more than a year. It looks a mess and is difficult for pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43,45,47, Millham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Metre deep manhole left open by workmen today Tues 23/9/25.. No safety around it at all.. a death trap in the dark or any time.. I have put a safety rail / barrier over it that i took from works across the road in GP Surgery, 23rd September
item.description:
Outside my house.. 9 Stoke Road, Bishops Cleeve, GL52 8 RP. Looks like the workmen who were working on the verge outside my house pulling wires thru have gone home forgetting to put service manhole cover back on.. very very dangerous.. no warnings or bollards left for safety.. I put a bollard over it myyself from across the road.. it is now a bit safer but still highly dangerous. I would class it as an emergency as people walk their dogs along the verge where open manhole is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Stoke Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed

item.title: Box of rubbish, 23rd September
item.description:
Recycling box filled with rubbish, also a load of rubbish bags by the bin which will no doubt be strewn across the payment soon. This resident is constantly doing this and needs talking to.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Granville Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal flyposting on Hucclecote Road adjacent to Brockworth Bypass lights, 23rd September
item.description:
Illegal flyposting on Hucclecote Road adjacent to Brockworth Bypass lights This is on public highway verge and is about 300m walking distance away from property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
